data.comment: The match is underway in Rotterdam.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Jonas Arweiler.
In the minute 11, Kees de Boer with an assist there.
Goal! Feyenoord draw level to 1-1 through a Lutsharel Geertruida header.
That's a fine assist from Steven Berghuis.
In the minute 36, Ridgeciano Haps (Feyenoord) has received a first yellow card.
The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at De Kuip.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Bryan Linssen with Luciano Narsingh. This is the first substitution made today by Dick Advocaat.
Joao Carlos Teixeira is on a sub for Orkun Kokcu for Feyenoord.
Feyenoord's Leroy Fer has been booked in Rotterdam.
In the minute 58, Goal! Marcos Senesi gives Feyenoord a 2-1 lead in Rotterdam.
Andrei Ratiu is replacing Amar Catic for Den Haag at De Kuip.
An attacking Den Haag player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 69, Shaquille Pinas levels the score at 2-2 from the penalty spot.
Goal! Luciano Narsingh gives Feyenoord a 3-2 lead.
The away team replace Vicente Besuijen with Bilal Ould-Chikh.
In the minute 79, Den Haag make their third substitution with Michiel Kramer replacing Jonas Arweiler.
Feyenoord have been given a penalty...
Shaquille Pinas is booked for the away team.
In the minute 84, Steven Berghuis nets and Feyenoord extend their lead to 4-2. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Wouter Burger is replacing Robert Bozenik for the home team.
The match has come to a close in Rotterdam. The final score is 4-2.
John Goossens is on a sub for Kees de Boer for Den Haag.
Aleksandar Rankovic (Den Haag) is making a fifth substitution, with Pascu replacing Dante Rigo.
